g1.title: PROMETHEUS OPERATOR - Real Metrics Collection
g1.description: Complete executePrometheusOperator() with prom-client library, custom metrics (counters, gauges, histograms), registry management, push gateway, alert manager

g2.title: GRAFANA OPERATOR - Real Visualization & Dashboards
g2.description: Complete executeGrafanaOperator() with Grafana HTTP API, dashboard management, data source management, alert rules, user management, annotations

g3.title: JAEGER OPERATOR - Real Distributed Tracing
g3.description: Complete executeJaegerOperator() with jaeger-client library, span creation, trace sampling, baggage handling, collector communication, dependency extraction

g4.title: SLACK/TEAMS/DISCORD OPERATOR - Real Team Communication
g4.description: Complete executeSlackOperator(), executeTeamsOperator(), executeDiscordOperator() with rich messaging, channel management, bot integration, webhooks, file sharing

g5.title: WEBHOOK OPERATOR - Real HTTP Event Processing
g5.description: Complete executeWebhookOperator() with Express.js integration, signature verification, event routing, rate limiting, SSL termination, request analytics

g6.title: EMAIL/SMS OPERATOR - Real Messaging Services
g6.description: Complete executeEmailOperator() and executeSmsOperator() with SMTP integration, HTML/plain text composition, SMS gateways, delivery tracking, templates
